Properties

deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0107 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
B Before the Date/Time specifiedBefore the Date/Time specified
L Later than the Date/Time specifiedLater than the Date/Time specified

Additional Language Displays

BVor dem angegebenen Zeitpunkt

name: DeferredResponseType
title: deferredResponseType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify which type of deferred query resonse is desired, as specified with the query parameters.   Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the QRD segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0107 (Deferred response type)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
